DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare three method deliver behavioral weight loss treatment.Participants randomly assign one three 18-month weight loss treatment ( group , individual , smartphone treatment ) . Participants assign group treatment attend group meeting weekly first 6 month , every 2 week 6 month , monthly final 6 month . Participants assign individual treatment attend one-on-one session weight loss counselor every month 18 month . Participants assign smartphone treatment use smartphone learn practice weight loss skill . They also attend one-on-one session weight loss counselor every month 18 month . Assessment visit conduct baseline , 6 , 12 , 18 month .
